data.name: MiLE HiGH TAXi
data.detailed_description:
It‚Äôs the 24th century, citizen. Mile High City is hiring new taxi drivers. Get in your hovercab and collect fares already. DO NOT let your meter run out on you!

‚ÄúMiLE HiGH TAXi is The Fifth Element meets Crazy Taxi‚Äù. ‚Äònuff said! Add it to your wishlist!

Drive your flying taxi cab in a race against time, transporting as many fares as you can before the meter clock runs out. There‚Äôs no time to customize your car in this single-player game. Get driving already!

Play as Kyle, Emma, or Skyler, a down-on-your-luck citizen relegated to the city's sub-100th floor level slums. Your new taxi driver career is an opportunity to get out of the smog, eternal shadows, and make some money. Fly through Mile High City picking up passengers from super skyscrapers. Deliver them to destinations fast to keep your job and earn bonus time. But keep your eyes on the sky - especially when using Hyper Drive Boost. You're not the only one driving the Skyways and strange things are happening in Mile High City these days! Use your NavCom AI to help you navigate and find hidden customers.

Once you get a handle on your new job by learning the city, use narrow back alleys to navigate faster while blasting through skyway traffic at up to 250mph in the 600+ floor level.

MiLE HiGH TAXi is a single player, game controller arcade game that you download and play on your PC (Windows, Linux) or Mac. It is being created by solo-developer Cassius John-Adams.

data.short_description: 'The Fifth Element' meets 'Crazy Taxi'. Enough said! Add MiLE HiGH TAXi to your Wishlist now!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 (at about 30 FPS)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
